abstract: Responding to requests from security experts, Google promises to turn on security features for more Gmail users.
snippet: Responding to requests from security experts, Google promises to turn on security features for more Gmail users.
lead_paragraph: A group of 38 computer scientists, law professors and security experts is urging Google to do to more to protect Gmail, Google Calendar and Google Docs from snooping.

headline.main: Gmail to Get More Protection From Snoops
